title: Gospel Movie | "Disclose the Mystery About the Bible"

json.text: Only Christ is the truth, the way, and the life.
The Bible can’t bestow life to man.
Only the last Christ, Almighty God, can bestow the way of life to man.
Any belief apart from the Bible is a heresy!
God’s work is all recorded in the Bible.
We should believe in God according to the Bible.
Almighty God’s coming has shaken every sect and denomination!
Is He truly God Himself who created all things and rules over everything?
Is He truly the Lord Jesus who was crucified
by the Israelites two thousand years ago?
“Ironclad Proofs” will provide you with the ironclad facts and ironclad evidences.
Before the ironclad facts and ironclad evidences, mankind will get the answer.
Hallelujah! Praise God in his holy temple;
praise him in the firmament of his power.
Praise him of his mighty acts;
praise him for his excellent greatness.
Praise him with the blast of the ram’s horn;
praise him with lyre and harp.
Praise him with trimbrel and dance;
praise him with strings and pipe.
Praise him with resounding cymbals;
praise him with the loud clanging cymbals.
Let everything that has breath praise the Lord.
Hallelujah.
You remind me of myself twenty years ago.
At that time, just like you,
I began to read the Bible, systematically studying theology
and walking the way of serving the Lord.
This is the Lord’s grace
and His great favor to us.
Thank the Lord!
Amen!
Now, let’s think back:
What’s the core of our seminary course?
The Bible is the only standard for our belief and life.
Right!
It is the core of our seminary course.
Every believer in God should remember this:
The whole Bible testifies of God Godself;
the Bible is the truth and is the perfect word of God;
every word in the Bible is inspired by almighty God,
without any error.
Thank the Lord!
Amen!
Amen!
Speaking of the Bible, for thousands of years,
no other book can take its sacred place in the hearts of Christians.
In the Bible, there are endless mysteries hidden within.
Many people have made an exploration,
but, no one can really unlock them.
Feng Jiahui believed in the Lord from childhood.
At 18, she entered seminary with full enthusiasm.
In her 30’s, she became a preacher
of a house church in Shanxi, China.
For many years,
Feng Jiahui devoted herself to studying the Bible.
In her heart, the Bible was a heavenly book
and had absolute divine authority….
It’s late. Get some rest.
Tomorrow morning, someone’s coming to preach, right?
Mm. Yeah.
Well, these days our church invited several preachers.
Mm.
But they just say the same old things.
Nothing new. We didn‘t receive any new supply.
I wonder about the one Brother Yuan invited.
I heard from Brother Yuan
that he has an insightful view about the Bible. (Oh!)
You can listen tomorrow.
That’s good!
Don’t worry too much. Try to get some rest.
Brothers and sisters,
next let’s read two more verses.
In Amos 4:6,
it says,
Amos 8:11 says,
Brothers and sisters,
from these two verses, we can see
the desolation of the church was ordained by God.
Just like at the end of the Age of the Law,
the temple was desolate. It became a den of thieves.
Money exchanged, ox, sheep, and doves were sold.
This is because the Lord Jesus did a new work outside the temple.
Similarly, today the church is desolate
because the work of the Holy Spirit has moved
and God has done a new work….
Wait!
God has done a new work?
Humph! Now I know!
This is exactly the “Eastern Lightning.”
What? “Eastern Lightning”?
Brother Yuan, this person believes in “Eastern Lightning.”
You really didn’t know that?
It’s “Eastern Lightning”!
How is it possible? …
Sister Feng,
the “Eastern Lightning” we’ve been guarding against
is exactly the return of the Lord Jesus.
Today, I invited Brother Shen here
just to talk about God’s new work with all of us….
New work? Humph!
All of God’s work and word are in the Bible.
We should believe in God according to the Bible.
Amen!
Any belief beyond the Bible is a heresy!
Amen!
All of God’s work is in the Bible.
What you talk about is beyond the Bible.
You’re a heretic.
How dare you come here to preach!
Humph….
Brothers and sisters, whether it is a heresy,
we should let him finish his words before making a conclusion.
Right. Let him go on.
Yeah!
What he said sounds reasonable.
Yeah!
Just now, you mentioned
that “any belief beyond the Bible is a heresy.”
Then, let’s fellowship about this.
Brothers and sisters, we all know that
before the Lord Jesus did His work,
there was only the Old Testament.
The New Testament was formed after 300 A.D.
Yes! Right! Yes!
At that time, the Lord Jesus didn’t do His work
according to the Old Testament,
but started the redemptive work in the Age of the Grace
outside the Old Testament.
For example, preaching the way of repentance,
the work of being crucified, and so on,
these works simply can’t be found in the Old Testament.
So, the saying that “any belief beyond the Bible is a heresy” is not right.
What can it prove?
Yes! Right! Yes!
Brothers and sisters,
we shouldn’t forget
when the Lord Jesus did His work,
it was condemned as a heresy.
Right. Yes.
So, today when facing God’s new work,
we should investigate carefully
and shouldn’t make a hasty conclusion.
Right. In fact, I think he speaks very well. (Yeah!)
What’s the good?
You have no discernment!
Humph! You are helping the outsider!
Brothers and sisters, the Bible says,
Brothers and sisters,
he said that the Lord has come back.
He is deceiving us.
Amen!
We should be watchful.
Amen!
Don’t fall into Satan’s scheme.
Amen!
For thousands of years,
people believe in God according to the Bible.
It can be said that believing in God is believing in the Bible,
and believing in the Bible is believing in God! (Amen!)
What he said has gone beyond the Bible.
Brothers and sisters,
don’t believe his words.
Amen!
Enough, enough!
Get away from the pulpit. Go away!
Right. Out!
Go!
Brothers, we invited Brother Shen here. (Go! Go! Go!)
We shouldn’t treat him like that.
Brothers and sisters, please calm down.
The Lord Jesus teaches us to entertain strangers, and love enemies.
Of course. Right! Yeah!
We should walk in the Lord’s way.
Right! Yes!
Brother Yuan, you’ve believed so many years.
You should have discernment.
Right! Yes!
I think what he said is right.
We should seek and investigate.
You’ve been deceived.
I’ll give you one last chance.
Repent to the Lord now.
Reject the “Eastern Lightning.”
I’m not deceived.
“Eastern Lightning” is exactly the true way,
is the Lord Jesus’ return.
Yuan Zhixuan, you’re an apostate.
You’re really irredeemable.
Yes! Yeah!
Now, in the name of the Lord Jesus,
I expel you from the church.
From now, no one can contact him.
Otherwise, you share in his evil.
Amen!
Sister Feng, you can expel me.
But facing such an important matter as the Lord Jesus’ return,
we should investigate carefully.
Unnecessary!
Brothers and sisters,
“Eastern Lightning” is a heresy.
Right! Amen!
Go away!
Drive them away!
Go! Go! Go!
Brother, we’d better go!
Go away. Get out of here! Go!
Brothers and sisters,
let’s quiet our hearts and seek and pray more.
Seek what?
I believe that God will lead us.
Out! Get out. Get out now!
Brothers and sisters,
the “Eastern Lightning” is deceiving people everywhere.
They’ve departed from the Bible and betrayed the Lord’s way.
Now, we must remember
that apart from the Bible, we will have no life.
Amen!
Now, I solemnly declare:
From now on,
no one is allowed to contact the “Eastern Lightning.” (Amen!)
No one is allowed to receive any foreign preacher, (Amen!)
much less take him to the church.
Otherwise, you will be expelled and cursed in prayer.
Amen!
The appearing of the “Eastern Lightning”
shook the whole religious world.
They believed that the way of the “Eastern Lightning” was beyond the Bible.
Beyond the Bible is heresy.
Feng Jiahui also believed that the Bible was God’s testimony
and God’s full manifestation,
if man left the Bible, he would lose life.
She couldn’t allow the heresy to deceive her fellow believers.
As a servant of the Lord,
she’d spare no effort to “safeguard the Lord’s way and protect the flock.”
At the same time,
the fellow churches in Henan and Hebei
were also trying their best  to resist the “Eastern Lightning”....
Today, those who came to the service  were even fewer.
If this goes on, whom will I preach to?
Ay! Sister Zhang and Sister Liu are completely done.
They won’t come back no matter how we try.
What were you doing? You couldn’t even look after some people?
I did poorly!
I’m indebted to the Lord.
The “Eastern Lightning” has deceived so many of us.
If all the believers are taken away by them,
whom shall we give a meeting and preach to?
Yeah! We should keep the inheritance that the Lord has given us.
We must try every way to stop the “Eastern Lightning.”
Yeah. We can’t sit and wait for death.
Elder Zhuang, look.
The “Eastern Lightning” takes our people away
and the church offerings become less and less.
We must find a way.
Ay!
Come here.
OK. I’ll handle it right away.
Mm, go tomorrow.
I will.
All right.
In these days, they resist more and more crazily.
Now they begin to seal off the churches.
Ay!
I never expected Sister Feng would resist so much.
Actually,
before I accepted God’s end-time work,
I held on to the Bible just like her.
Later, through the brothers and sisters’ lots of fellowshipping.
I understood the inside truth of the Bible,
walked out of the Bible step by step,
and came before God.
Right! What God will accomplish
cannot be hindered by anyone.
Brother,
today we can accept God’s end-time work,
and this is God’s grace to us.
God’s sheep can surely recognize God’s voice.
Amen!
We should have faith.
Brother, I have faith.
Mm.
Ay!
In our church, many brothers and sisters who truly love the Lord
expect the Lord’s coming every day.
Now, the Lord has really come back,
yet they are deceived and bound by men,
falling into darkness and having no way to go.
They’re really pitiful.
Brother, don’t worry.
Today, God descends and works in a hidden way
just to “steal treasures,” to save these people.
Why say “steal treasures”?
You remember the Bible says that the Lord comes “as a thief,” right?
Of course I remember.
The Bible says, the Lord comes “as a thief,”
and it refers to God’s end-time incarnation.
God is incarnated to save all those
who have a good humanity and truly believe in Him.
They are the treasures.
They’ll be brought into God’s family
and taken up before the throne.
This is “stealing treasures” we often mention, (Mm.)
that is, “stealing sheep.”
The Lord comes “as a thief”
just to save these people and perfect these people.
Those who are “stolen”
are “gold, silver, and precious stones”
and are “good sheep.”
Brother,
according to the Bible, where is the place
built of gold, silver, and precious stones?
Of course in the kingdom of heaven.
Right!
The foundation in the kingdom of heaven,
the buildings in the kingdom of heaven,
and the holy city are built with these gold, silver, and precious stones.
We only preach the gospel to those who have a good humanity
and truly believe in God.
We should have patience and love
and try our best to cooperate with God.
Oh! (Right!)
Actually, the Lord comes “as a thief” to “steal treasures.” (Mm.)
This is a mystery!
Mm.
Thank God! (Thank God!)
Now I understand.
Brother Shen, Zheng Yongming is an elder of the church.
He’s a good person and a true believer.
I want to see him again.
Good!
We must bring him before God.
Thank God!
All right!
Let’s pray for them together.
OK!
Elder Mo, how’s your business recently?
Thank the Lord!
It’s all the Lord’s grace. It’s good.
I wanna tell you something….
Recently, we’ve tried some things.
Morning prayer, evening prayer,
Bible study, fasting prayer more and more,
even a correspondence course.
The whole week is occupied.
But, the brothers and sisters are still taken away continuously by the “Eastern Lightning.”
Ay!
Thank the Lord. The church is the Lord’s body.
The Lord will take full responsibility.
Let’s pray more!
Mm!
Oh, look at the time!
Why Liu Shoujun hasn’t come yet?
Humph! He must have some ulterior....
Sister Feng, Brother Liu is here.
Thank the Lord! Brothers and sisters, peace to you!
There you are. Have a seat.
It’s really a long way from Henan to Shanxi.
You must have something important, right?
Yeah!
Here are some Henan specialties from Elder Zhuang.
Just a little gift.
We’re brothers and sisters in the Lord.
Don’t go to so much trouble.
Elder Zhuang planned to come personally this time,
but recently he is really busy with the church work.
Ay!
You also know the matter about the “Eastern Lightning.”
It’s really a headache.
Elder Zhuang hopes that our churches in the three provinces  can reunite to resist the “Eastern Lightning.”
I came especially for this matter.
Join with Zhuang Renjun and Tao Airong to resist the “Eastern Lightning”? (Mm!)
Humph!
Zhuang Renjun? Tao Airong?
Humph! Before, to contend for power and profit,
they did many things to hurt Sister Feng.
Even we couldn’t tolerate it.
Right!
Zhuang Renjun often created conflicts among the co-workers and did things to sow discord.
He fabricated rumors to frame Sister Feng
and even drove her out of the church.
He went too far!
To tell the truth, I don’t want to associate with such a person.
Humph!
Elder Zhuang is very regretful.
He said that in the past
he somewhat misunderstood and hurt Sister Feng.
He confessed to the Lord many times.
This time, he especially asked me to convey his apologies
and hoped that brothers and sisters could put aside the past,
forbear and endure each other,
and unite in the Lord.
Now, the “Eastern Lightning” is so rampant.
We must join together to resist the “Eastern Lightning.”
Should we join them or not?
Elder Zhuang has a bad humanity.
That year, they divided the church
and raised jealousy and strife.
It was really hurtful....
However, our strength now is not strong enough
to resist the “Eastern Lightning”….
Co-workers, the “Eastern Lightning”
has taken away so many of our believers.
How can we give account to the Lord?
Now the only way is to join together
to resist the “Eastern Lightning.”
This is most important!
To protect the flock and save the deceived brothers and sisters,
it can be a way.
Let’s pray more for this matter.
Amen!
Pray in the holy name of the Lord Jesus Christ.
Amen!
Thank the Lord!
Co-workers, we’ve been parted for three years.
Three years.
Today, the Lord brings us  important co-workers in the three provinces together.
The church is the Lord’s body.
The Lord’s intention is to let us unite.
We can’t be divided.
Yes! Of course!
The significance of this co-worker meeting is extraordinary.
I believe that everyone present
is not strange to the words “Eastern Lightning.”
Yes!
Actually, the people of the “Eastern Lightning” are not fearsome.
What is fearsome is that we co-workers can’t unite together.
That’s it! Yes! Yes!
As long as we join together,
we can resist the “Eastern Lightning.”
Brothers and sisters,
let’s safeguard the Lord’s way and protect the flock! (Amen!)
I believe that the Lord will be with us
and care for and keep us.
Amen!
Thank the Lord. We can reunite.
It has the Lord’s good purpose.
As long as we join together,
we can resist the “Eastern Lightning.”
Amen! Right!
Thank the Lord!
We must be of one heart and one mind and find some effective ways
to protect the brothers and sisters
from being deceived by the “Eastern Lightning.”
So when the Lord comes, we can give an account.
Amen!
As far as I know,
the brothers and sisters are deceived
mainly because they read the books of the “Eastern Lightning”
and heard their messages.
So, we must find some effective measures
to make the brothers and sisters feel terrified
when they hear “Eastern Lightning” and avoid it like the plague.
As long as they don’t contact the “Eastern Lightning,”
they surely will not be deceived.
Every day, we ask the brothers and sisters
not to contact the “Eastern Lightning,”
but it doesn’t work.
Do you have any better way?
Yeah.
There is a way,
but we need to join together.
We can ask co-workers to give testimony.
Because everyone is familiar with their local co-workers,
they’ll see through it.
So, we can give testimony in other places.
For example, Henan gives testimony in Hebei,
and Hebei gives testimony in Shanxi,
so that the brothers and sisters will believe  that the “Eastern Lightning” deceives, afflicts, and is a mafia,
and they will fear and shiver on the name “Eastern Lightning.”
Then, they will naturally stay away from the “Eastern Lightning.”
Mm, yes.
Yes. We should never allow them to contact the “Eastern Lightning.”
We can ask someone to give testimony
and tell them the “Eastern Lightning”
broke the arms and legs of brothers and sisters
and some even disappeared.
Thank the Lord. Good idea!
Isn’t this obviously fabricating rumors?
Isn’t it too much for us to say so?
Right!
As long as we can deal with the “Eastern Lightning” and protect the flock,
whatever we do won’t be too much.
If we don’t make it serious, can they be frightened?
We’ve served the Lord for half of our life.
If all the sheep are taken away by the “Eastern Lightning,”
how can we give account to the Lord?
We’ll be too ashamed to face Him.
Yeah.
We can’t give account.
It says in the Ten Commandments,
This is against the Lord’s will.
Yeah!
We’d better lead the brothers and sisters
to study the Bible and pray more.
Right!
So they can take root
and won’t be deceived by the “Eastern Lightning.”
Right!
Is it useful?
We watch them get taken away group after group.
Studying the Bible, praying can’t solve the problem.
It’s useless!
It’s useless!
Once they contact the “Eastern Lightning,”
they couldn’t be brought back as if they had been drugged.
If we still do nothing,
I’m afraid everyone will be gone.
Yeah!
Hmm. I think Elder Zhuang’s idea is good.
We can join together and send the co-workers to give testimony.
That way, we can guard against the “Eastern Lightning.”
I agree.
Thank the Lord!
Co-workers, we are all the Lord’s servants.
Since the Lord lets us watch over His sheep,
we should be faithful to Him.
Yes!
It is just the “Eastern Lightning” is too rampant.
In order to protect the brothers and sisters,
this is the only choice we have.
However,
we can’t let the believers know it,
because they’re still immature in life.
But we co-workers
should understand and sustain each other.
I believe that the Lord understands what we feel now.
Yes! Right!
We really have no choice.
Well, Sister Tao.
Yes!
Who in your place can give testimony?
Our co-workers
Diao Wen and Qu Xin can do it.
They’ll arrive tomorrow.
Good. Thank the Lord!
Sister Feng, what about you?
We agree to resist the “Eastern Lightning.”
But we need to consider the way of how to give the testimony.
Right!
Still need to think?
Sister Feng, you should do it as soon as possible.
If you still hesitate,
all the brothers and sisters will be taken away.
How shall we give account to the Lord?
I’ve thought it over and over.
It’s right to resist the “Eastern Lightning,”
but by giving false testimony, my heart is not peaceful.
Yeah, I feel the same.
It’s not according to the Lord’s teaching.
Giving false testimony is a big sin.
The Bible says that anyone who does it will be cursed.
He seriously offends God’s disposition
and will be punished!
We can’t do such evil.
Yeah! This seriously goes against God’s commandments
and is a great evil.
We mustn’t do it.
We should safeguard the Lord’s way according to the Bible
and put more effort in the Bible….
Brothers and sisters, do not be deceived by them.
Amen!
That’s all for my testimony.
Thank the Lord!
Amen!
Too terrible.... They can’t be right!
Brothers and sisters, peace to you in the Lord!
Amen!
Just now the brothers and sisters from Hebei and Henan
gave their testimony.
To us, the testimony is a great warning.
Right! Yeah! Yes!
Brothers and sisters, do you know?
The “Eastern Lightning” has taken in millions of members  in just a few years.
No Way! What?
What does it show?
They are devouring our believers
at the rate of three hundred persons per day.
This is really horrible!
This is a fierce spiritual war.
Amen! Yeah!
In order to have more discernment about the “Eastern Lightning,”
next, let’s welcome Sister Feng
to share with us how to hold on to the Lord’s way
and discern various heresies.
Great. Thank the Lord! Praise the Lord!
Sister Feng studied theology
and devotes herself to studying the Bible.
Brothers and sisters,
in the time to come, let’s beseech the Lord
with a heart of praying and seeking,
asking Him to bestow upon us
the truth in the Bible through His servant.
Amen! Thank the Lord! Yes!
How admirable!
She studied theology before.
I heard that she ran a Bible training class.
Brothers and sisters, peace to you in the Lord!
Amen!
The Bible is the canon of Christianity.
We should know that
the whole Bible is God’s full revelation
and each word is inspired by the Holy Spirit.
Amen!
So, all of God’s word is in the Bible.
Amen!
God’s word doesn’t exist outside the Bible.
Yes....
Any belief apart from the Bible is a heresy.
Amen!
Apart from the Bible, we can’t believe in God, (Yeah.)
and we’ll lose our life.
Amen!
Thank the Lord!
Thank God! Thank God! Good point!
Brothers and sisters,
please turn to 2 Timothy 3:16.
Let’s read it together.
Ok! Right!
Amen!
Thank the Lord!
Brothers and sisters,
the foundation of our belief is the Bible.
Yes. Yeah.
The Bible is the perfect word of God,
without any error at all.
Amen!
Recently, the “Eastern Lightning”
is taking and robbing sheep from various churches.
They not only deny that
“all scripture is given by inspiration of God,”
but they say the Lord is back (Huh? This is unbelievable?)
and has done a new work and spoken new words.
This is exactly a deception.
Amen!
We must see through Satan’s scheme, (Right! Amen!)
and never be deceived by them.
Amen!
We must remember:
If we depart from the Bible in our belief and behavior,
we are extremely unfaithful to the Lord.
Yeah! Yes!
Only holding on to the Bible
is holding on to the Lord’s way.
Amen!
The Bible is the only way that helps us know God.
Yeah! Right! Yes.
We believe in Jesus.
Only if we follow the Bible’s teaching
can we enter the kingdom of heaven.
Amen!
Otherwise, we can’t be saved….
Right! Yes!
Now this heresy is deceiving people.
As long as we hold on to the Bible,
they can’t take us away….
Amen!
Brother, the “Eastern Lightning” didn’t take me away.
It’s after reading a lot of Almighty God’s words
that I believe He is the returned Lord Jesus.
It refers to God’s end-time work and word.
Brother, you and I believed since childhood
and we’ve been expecting the Lord.
Today, the Lord has come back.
This is a great matter, we should treat it carefully.
The Bible says,
You’d better investigate.
You’ve come several times,
talking about this matter.
And I’m also praying.
The Lord’s return is something very important….
It’s true!
How about asking Brother Shen to come tomorrow?
We can talk more about it together.
Then, I’ll ask Tianwen and Yang Chen to come.
That’s great….
Jiahui, you just got back. Have a rest.
I’ll cook in a minute, huh.
Let me do it.
I know these days
you must have eaten poorly.
It’s fine, since it was just me.
Hey, how is our daughter’s school?
Did she call home?
Yes.
Hmm.
Recently she didn’t get good grades.
Oh.
You’d better call her often.
Thank the Lord!
Let’s have dinner.
Bring the food here.
All right!
Who is it?
Me.
Hey! (Oh! Sister Han.)
Sister Feng, you’ve finally come back.
Something happened in our church….
Take it easy. Slow down.
Elder Zheng and some others believe in….
Through these days of fellowship,
I understand more than I did in the past decades.
Yeah! The word has authority and power.
It’s really God’s personal utterance.
Yeah!
These words are so practical!
Right!
It’s the truth!
Thank God!
Hearing it, I feel much more clear.
Right!
Let’s read another passage of God’s word.
OK.
Who is it? One minute.
Jiahui!
Sister Feng ... Sister Feng....
Sisters, hello! Please sit down.
I’ve really underestimated you “Eastern Lightning.”
You’re too audacious.
You even dare come to my co-worker while I was away.
You’re robbing sheep openly….
Brothers and sisters,
the Bible clearly records,
You lead others astray to lose the Lord’s salvation.
What’s your intention?
They’re wolves, wolves in sheep’s clothing.
Sister Feng,
we can’t let them get away with this.
Zheng Yongming! As an elder of the church,
you know well “Eastern Lightning” is a heresy,
but you invite wolves into your home.
I trusted you so much,
but you….
Aren’t you bringing the brothers and sisters into hell?
If you want preaching,
I’ll preach to you.
Who is versed in the Bible, me or them?
You even dare to bring the “Eastern Lightning”
to preach in your home?
She’s right!
How can you bring heretics into your home?
You invite the wolves in and harm the brothers and sisters.
How can you face the Lord?
Sister Feng, take it easy.
After these days of listening, I understand
that “Eastern Lightning” isn’t a heresy. (Yeah!)
It’s really the return of the Lord Jesus.
Let’s investigate carefully.
Right! Sister Feng.
Right! Sister Feng.
The Lord’s return is such an important matter,
we really should think about it.
Yeah!
Sister Feng,
you’re the lead sheep of our church
and know more about the Bible than us.
What they preach these days
is indeed the true way.
That’s right! Sister Feng….
Jiahui, come here.
You see, except Brother Shen and his colleague,
everyone here is a co-worker in your charge.
Didn’t Yang Chen say it just now?
You’re the lead sheep of our church.
We shouldn’t shame the Lord’s name.
Don’t be angry.
With the truth, will we fear dispute?
I graduated from seminary and studied the Bible many years.
How long have they read the Bible?
Dare to dispute with me? Humph!
Then you’d better listen.
That’s being responsible for the lives of the brothers and sisters.
Go. Sit.
Please sit down, Sister Feng.
Brother Shen, Brother Guo, sit down please! Come. Everyone, sit down please.
We can have a talk!
Here, have some water.
Today, I’ll broaden their horizons and let them see how I take down the people of the “Eastern Lightning.”
Humph!
Thank the Lord. First, I want to say something.
Brothers and sisters,
our church used to be burning like fire,
but now it is desolate.
These years, I’ve been pondering:
We’ve tried all kinds of ways,
but why can’t the church be revived?
Last time Brother Shen said that the church is desolate
